name: SUPER SMASH BROS 8 ULTIMATE
description:
Welcome to my Smash Bros game! Feel free to leave any feedback or suggestions in the comments below!

--

Controls - 

Player 1 -

A and D - Move left and right

W - Jump

S - Fall

T - Attack

Y - Shield

Player 2 -

Left and Right arrows - Move left and right

Up arrow - Jump

Down arrow - Fall

P - Attack

O - Shield

To change color: click your character portrait just like the actual SSB games!

To change to CPU: click either the "PLAYER1" or "PLAYER2" button.

To change back to HUMAN: click the "CPU" button.
